event.event-label: CHUBB-TVBS-CAMERA-MIB defined trap event: healthChange panMotor
event.descr:
This notification is sent when one or more of the health information changes. Show the fault item and its state.

cameraIdentifier %parm[#1]%;

healthChangeReason %parm[#2]%;

panMotor(0) tiltMotor(1) zoomMotor(2) apertureMotor(3) focusMotor(4) wiperMotor(5) heater(6) fluidLevel(7) videoSignal(8) housingTamper(9) washerMotorFault(10) configPlugFault(11) tvbuCameraCommsFault(12)

faultState %parm[#3]%;

clear(0) triggered(1)
event.logmsg: healthChange trap received cameraIdentifier=%parm[#1]% healthChangeReason=%parm[#2]% faultState=%parm[#3]%
